newsitem.title: USA: Financial Intranet sees profits from pact.
newsitem.headline: Financial Intranet sees profits from pact.

text.p: Financial Intranet Inc said Monday it had signed a three-year agreement with WorldCom Inc that it expected to generate $2.5 million in net profits during the first year.
"We expect it to begin to generate revenues immediately, projected to be $15 million gross," the company said in a statement.
Under the agreement, WorldCom will provide voice, data and video transmission services for Financial Intranet's distribution network.

Financial Intranet, an intranet developer, said it plans to generate revenues by providing additional sales and cost savings to ceritified financial planners and investment advisors, as well as members of the futures community.
